question: For the latest Information on COVID-19:
text:
For the latest Information on COVID-19:
          
        
Pennsylvania Department of Health
 has the latest health and safety information and information on the roll out of the newly authorized COVID-19 vaccine.
Governor Wolfs Statewide Response to COVID-19 Page
 has the latest information on what the Pennsylvania Government is doing in response to COVID-19.
CDC.gov/coronavirus
 has the latest public health and safety information from CDC and for the overarching medical and health provider community on COVID-19.
USA.gov/coronavirus
 to see what the U.S. Government is doing in response to COVID-19.
